Client Module
[eProsima RPCDDS API Reference]

This group contains related API to create a client application. This API is used by the tool rpcddsgengen to generate custom code based in a defined interface. That interface and its remote procedure have to be defined in IDL language. More...

Collaboration diagram for Client Module:

Classes

class  eprosima::rpc::proxy::Proxy
 This class implements the common functionalities that all server's proxies have. More...

Detailed Description

This group contains related API to create a client application. This API is used by the tool rpcddsgengen to generate custom code based in a defined interface. That interface and its remote procedure have to be defined in IDL language.

Generated on 29 Aug 2014 for eProsima RPCDDS C++ API by  1.6.1
